title: Costa Rica Fossil Discovery Reveals Mastodon and Sloth Giants
description: Researchers at the Museo Nacional de Costa Rica have confirmed a major paleontological find in the province of Cartago: fossil remains from a mastodon-like creature and a giant ground sloth. This discovery ranks among the country’s most notable in recent decades and sheds light on the megafauna that once roamed Central America. The story started [...]The post Costa Rica Fossil Discovery Reveals Mastodon and Sloth Giants appeared first on The Tico Times | Costa Rica News | Travel | Real Estate.

title: Asia’s real masters of the sea, from Indonesia’s forgotten kingdom to Vietnam’s ancient empire
description: The Mark Of Empire follows the traces of Asia’s maritime civilisations, from Srivijaya to Sulu, exploring how they continue to shape faith, identity and craft today. Here’s why the series will grab you.

title: Ancient Karnataka temple architecture inspires Modi’s new office complex
description: The new Seva Teerth office complex for PM Modi embraces Indian architectural traditions, departing from colonial styles. It utilizes sandstone, metal domes inspired by Buddha Stupas, and screenwork. Design elements draw from Chalukyan temples, including the Chennakeshava Temple, blending historical references with modern functionality.

title: Jeffrey Epstein’s interest in dinosaurs has led to a reckoning in the paleontology community
description: A British dinosaur convention is banning paleontologists named in the Jeffrey Epstein files from attending DinoCon – as the global scientific community becomes the latest to grapple with the convicted sex offender’s connections to prominent people in the worlds of business, politics and academia.

title: Jeffrey Epstein’s interest in dinosaurs has led to a reckoning in the paleontology community
